ecosystem.question: What is ARTS Innovations and how is your ecosystem unique for the aerospace industry?
ecosystem.answer:
ARTS Innovations is a technological ecosystem that combines artificial intelligence and blockchain to meet the critical challenges of traceability, compliance and asset management in the aerospace industry. 
We have developed a sovereign infrastructure, the METRA blockchain, dedicated to securing sensitive data (technical documents, maintenance histories, inspections, spare parts), while automating high value-added processes thanks to AI. This ecosystem is designed to integrate with industry regulatory and operational standards.

documents.question: What does blockchain certification actually enable for my aeronautical documents?
documents.answer:
Blockchain certification via our METRASign solution guarantees that every document (certificate, report, logbook, etc.) is authentic, forgery-proof and time-stamped.It provides verifiable proof of origin and integrity at all times, permanent traceability for audits or asset transitions, and a reduction in disputes linked to incomplete or modified documents.
Our solutions integrate into your existing processes, and are simple to use both in the field and remotely.

ai.question: How does artificial intelligence improve document and technical management?
ai.answer:
Our artificial intelligence, integrated into the MetraFleet platform, automatically recognizes imported documents, classifies them according to a standardized tree structure (IATA/CAMO), extracts key data (references, hours, cycles, replacements), and checks their regulatory compliance.
It detects inconsistencies, learns to reason like a CAMO, and automatically updates asset statuses. The result: considerable time savings, fewer human errors, and continuous, auditable compliance.

clients.question: Who can benefit from your solutions? Are they reserved for large groups?
clients.answer:
Our solutions are designed to be modular, scalable and accessible to all players in the sector:
Lessors and asset managers: to digitize transitions, reinforce documentary value and automate airworthiness monitoring.
MROs and airlines: to make certificates more reliable, digitize inspections, and implement predictive maintenance.
Part-21 and Part-145 workshops: to certify their documents securely and meet regulatory requirements.
Our SaaS model enables rapid deployment with personalized support, on site or remotely.

data.question: Is my data protected? Doesn't blockchain mean making everything public?
data.answer:
No. Our METRA blockchain is private, sovereign and RGPD-compliant.
Only the cryptographic fingerprints (hashes) of the documents are written to the blockchain. The documents themselves remain stored in a secure environment that you control, whether in your internal system or in a secure cloud.
This model guarantees data confidentiality, while ensuring total traceability, integrity and auditability.
